categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic squads

nodes.text: Nomad squad was a unit of ten veteran Alliance soldiers serving at the Rebel outpost on Taul during the Galactic Civil War. During the Battle of Taul, Nomad squad was under the command of Commander Krendan. Among the squad were a grenade launcher specialist and a repeating blaster specialist. The rest of the squad were armed with hunting blasters and vibroblades.
